Hi Erick,

The EventBase class belongs to the Microsoft.Practices.Composite.dll assembly. It appears that the error you are getting is because you have to add a reference to that assembly and to Microsoft.Practices.Composite.Presentation.dll to be able to use the CompositePresentationEvent class, as the CompositePresentationEvent class inherits from EventBase.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
